osvSchema.summary: streamlit/streamlit: Information exposure through an exception
osvSchema.details:
streamlit/streamlit: Information exposure through an exception

Leaking information about an exception, such as messages and stack traces, to an external user can expose implementation details that are useful to an attacker for developing a subsequent exploit.
This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in streamlit/streamlit version 1.17.1.dev20230124 by commit afcf880c60e5d7538936cc2d9721b9e1bc02b075. For more details please see the references link.
